bibl.title: The Barcelona Papyrus and the Early Egyptian Eucharistic Prayer.
bibl.note: P. Monts. Roca [P. Barc.] Inv. 154b et 155a (= van Haelst 863; LDAB 552). - I. Introduction. - II. Structural Analysis of the Barcelona Papyrus. - III. MARKan Elements in Barcelona [MARK = the Alexandrian anaphora of St. Mark]. - IV. Barcelona and STR [STR = P. Stras. Inv. 254 (= van Haelst 998; LDAB 5836)]. - V. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Ray Walter D., The Barcelona Papyrus and the Early Egyptian Eucharistic Prayer.
